SentenceArray: You will find here information about me and also projects I made.

About.Content: I am passionate about programming and I broaden my horizons every day. I am interested in the latest trends in the field of creating websites, web applications, blogs, games, etc. As a developer, I focus on UI and UX issues and make sure that the websites run smoothly and are adapted to be displayed on any device. I specialize in JavaScript and other front-end technologies, but in developing my competencies I also focus on server technologies. I approach each project individually. I focus on communication with the customer while finding the best possible solutions. I also have many other interests, one of which is creating electronic music that you can listen to on my SoundCloud.

Skills.Title: Skills
Skills.SubTitle: My skills and technologies I use

Offer.Title: Offer
Offer.SubTitle: What do I offer and what I pay attention to

MakingWebsites.Title: Creating Websites
MakingWebsites.Description: I use the latest solutions and technologies to create websites. I follow modern trends and meet all current standards. Both the look and layout of the pages are based on an intuitive, nice interface and responsive design.

ResponsiveDesign.Title: Responsive Design
ResponsiveDesign.Description: The entire appearance of the page and its layout automatically adapts to the browser window in which it is displayed. The website created in such a technique is very universal, and its operation becomes much more convenient regardless of the device on which it is displayed.

IntuitiveInterface.Title: Intuitive Interface
IntuitiveInterface.Description: I arrange all elements of the page in an intuitive way for the user to make navigating the site independent of the device simple and pleasant. In addition, I offer a modern, interesting look and I take care of all details regarding element animation to make the usage clear and understandable.

ServerAdministration.Title: Server Administration
ServerAdministration.Description: I deal with the maintenance of completed projects and the quick implementation of changes and possible corrections on the server I lease.

YourTurn.Description: Application - The division of household duties

SWPIU.Description: System for finding products and services

MOT.Description: Game to improve your MOT skills
